about_the_game:
Kong's Wrath: City of Mayhem is a simple arcade style roguelike "beat 'em up" game. Rampage in a destructible, climbable, 3D city. Throw cars, defeat your attackers, and collect bananas throughout the endless concrete jungle. Bananas recover your health, increase your score, and provide temporary magical powers, but each bananas also increases the enemy presence! This game features:

  • An endless procedurally generated, destructible environment
  • Ever-increasing levels of enemy resistance based on player score
  • An in-game world-wide leaderboard
  • The classic gigantic simian kaiju, Kong, with new, never before seen abilities!




The game has 3D platformer controls that support controller or keyboard and mouse. It is a single player game, but your top score is visible to all other players in the leaderboard, so that players compete indirectly for the highest banana count.

short_description: Become the banana-hungry kaiju, Kong. Climb, fight, and leap your way through a highly militarized concrete jungle. Collect bananas, and compete for the highest banana count on a world-wide leaderboard. This is a roguelike, arcade style game with no ending, only further mayhem.
